text:
Brought my mom and kids here to eat. Service was prompt and staff were very nice. We didn’t have to wait long for the food. The food was delicious and my kids loved it, especially the fried rice and the red bead pancakes.
The surrounding was peaceful and nice. Good place for a chill lunch on Saturday. Will bring my family here again for sure.
Food always taste good. Radish pastry is one of the must order dishes! Service staff are attentive and pleasant dining environment at airport T3 branch.

Menu didn't state that the signature pork bone  ramen comes with lots of kelp. It's quite off putting, affected my appetite and totally changes the taste of the broth, cannot taste what's signature about it. Too many vegetable and colour of the dish matters as well. The pork prawn dumpling is very generous and big portion though.
Have been visiting this outlet for years. Food quality is consistent and the children love the food as well. The Xiao Long Bao is delicious and well loved by the kids!

Don’t compare this with DTF then you’ll likely find the dining experience to be quite pleasant. The service is really good.

Comparing to DTF, I think the hot and sour soup is too thick making the texture gooey. I think it’s strange to serve noodle in pork broth when you ordered chicken doodle. The texture of the middle is really smooth and good though.
